Keywords: A.I.M. , Avengers , New Mutants , Scientist , X-Men
Real Name: Roberto Da Costa
Special Powers
SUPREME LEADER OF A.I.M.: Leadership. When Sunspot uses it and succeeds, friendly characters that are adjacent or have the A.I.M. or Scientist keyword gain SAFEGUARD: Outwit until your next turn.
PLUS YOU ALL GET HEALTH INSURANCE!: Energy Shield/Deflection. // When a friendly character that's adjacent or has the A.I.M. or Scientist keyword would take 4 or more damage, they take 3 instead.
